title: Who Laughs Last
description: They say revenge is a dish best served cold...But I'd rather serve it hot, with a side of humiliation.The Icons got what they wanted. My life is a smoldering wreck because of them.But that doesn't mean I'm done fighting.What I did to Trent is just the beginning. He deserves so much worse for what he's done to me.West and Reese are no better. They told me they cared about me, but when it mattered most, they took his side over mine.My body still craves all of them.But my broken heart?It just wants to take all of them down.This is book two of the Clearwater University duet, a new adult reverse harem bully romance. Due to language and sexual situations, it is recommended for readers 18+.
author: Eva Ashwood
